intent_atoms.description: Restore SwiftLint complexity thresholds to enforce guardrails on parser and UI code growth.
Complexity thresholds for cyclomatic_complexity, function_body_length, type_body_length, and nesting are re‑introduced in .swiftlint.yml with documentation.
Local pre‑push Git hook runs swiftlint lint --strict --quiet and fails when violations exist.
GitHub Actions workflow runs SwiftLint on pull requests and pushes for Sources, Tests, FoundationUI, shared config, and ComponentTestApp, producing JSON artifacts per target.
FoundationUI and ComponentTestApp phases must fail the job if violations are found; main project phase is informational only until large files shrink below 1,500 lines.
PR comment summarizes errors/warnings and links to artifacts.
Main-project strict mode remains off until oversized files drop below 1,500 lines.
Git hook uses swiftlint --strict --quiet before push; GitHub Actions installs SwiftLint on macOS-15 runners and runs three scoped analyses with JSON reporters.
Automation backlog dependencies (A2/A8/A10) are documented to coordinate future adjustments.

functional_units.name: SwiftLint Configuration File
functional_units.description: Defines complexity thresholds for cyclomatic_complexity, function_body_length, type_body_length, and nesting in .swiftlint.yml

functional_units.name: Git Pre-Push Hook
functional_units.description: Runs swiftlint lint --strict before every push, failing if violations exist

functional_units.name: GitHub Actions SwiftLint Workflow
functional_units.description: Automated CI job that runs SwiftLint on pull requests and pushes for specified directories and publishes JSON reports

functional_units.name: Main Project Linting Step
functional_units.description: Informational-only SwiftLint run on Sources & Tests with tolerant errors and artifact upload

functional_units.name: FoundationUI Linting Step
functional_units.description: Strict SwiftLint run on FoundationUI directory, failures block job

functional_units.name: ComponentTestApp Linting Step
functional_units.description: Strict SwiftLint run inside Examples/ComponentTestApp, failures block the job

functional_units.name: PR Comment Summary
functional_units.description: Adds a PR comment summarizing per-target errors/warnings and links to artifacts

functional_units.name: Quality Gate Step
functional_units.description: Blocks pipeline only when FoundationUI or ComponentTestApp phases fail

functional_units.name: Documentation of Guardrails
functional_units.description: Notes in config comments, workflow @todos and repo todo.md for future adjustments

functional_units.name: Strict Mode Enablement Tracker
functional_units.description: Tracks when the main‑project strict flag should re‑enable after large files shrink below 1500 lines
